00044 namespace SimSite3D{
00045 
00046   typedef enum{
00047     WARN_UKNOWN_METALS,
00048     SILENTLY_IGNORE_UKNOWN_METALS
00049   }metal_warn_type;
00050 
00052   typedef struct{
00053     std::string pdb_metal_str;    
00054     atom_type metal_name;         
00055     interactionType act_type;     
00056     my_float_t interact_pt_rad;   
00057     my_float_t min_act_dist; 
00058     my_float_t max_act_dist; 
00059   }pdb_metal_info_t;
00060 
00062   class PDB_metals{
00063   public:
00064   
00066 
00075     static const pdb_metal_info_t* 
00076     lookup(const std::string metal_name, const std::string metal_res,
00077            metal_warn_type warn_if_unknown = WARN_UKNOWN_METALS);
00078 
00080 
00089     static const pdb_metal_info_t* 
00090     lookup(const atom_type metal, 
00091            metal_warn_type warn_if_unknown = WARN_UKNOWN_METALS);
00092 
00093     static const my_float_t MAX_METAL_1_SQUARED_LENGTH;
00094     static const my_float_t MAX_METAL_2_SQUARED_LENGTH;
00095     static const my_float_t MIN_METAL_1_SQUARED_LENGTH;
00096     static const my_float_t MIN_METAL_2_SQUARED_LENGTH;
00097 
00098   private:
00099     static void
00100     set_metal_res_names();
00101 
00102     static std::map<atom_type, std::vector<std::string> > A_metal_res_names;
00103     static const uint A_metal_array_size;   
00104     static const pdb_metal_info_t A_metal_array[]; 
00105     static const std::string A_fname;   
00106   };
